description: Reviewed and updated content on the client's website to reflect latest products and services.
Created a visually appealing and informative brochure design for the client's marketing campaign.
Developed a fully functional mobile application with advanced features and seamless user experience.
notes: App successfully launched on both iOS and Android platforms.

description: Optimized website content and implemented SEO strategies to improve search engine ranking and organic traffic.
notes: SEO improvements resulted in a noticeable increase in website traffic.

description: Produced a series of educational video tutorials covering various topics for the client's online learning platform.
notes: Video tutorials well-received by users, positive feedback received.

description: Redesigned the company logo to reflect brand evolution and modernize its appearance.
notes: New logo implemented across all branding materials.

description: Designed and developed a customized software solution tailored to the client's specific business needs.
notes: Software successfully deployed and integrated with existing systems.

description: Designed and launched a targeted social media campaign to promote client's product launch event.
notes: Campaign generated significant engagement and drove traffic to event website.
